queries.text:
from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmcpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == v.CustID)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == v.LoadMasterClusterID)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Idle" or r["_field"] == "Iowait" or r["_field"] == "System" or r["_field"] == "User")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == v.CustID)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == v.LoadMasterClusterID)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Free" or r["_field"] == "Used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: -5m, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmcpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == v.CustID)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == v.LoadMasterClusterID)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "User")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmcpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == "1001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Idle")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 100.0 - r._value}))
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == "1001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == "1001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: min, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value}))
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == "1001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Memused")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == "1001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "System")

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmcpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == "1001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Iowait")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lmmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == "1001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == "1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Free" or r["_field"] == "Memused")
 //group by time to isolate the values you want to sum togehter
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "_value")
//to ungroup your data provide a group without any columns
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "total")

from(bucket: "axf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "totalconns")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Custid"] == v.CustID)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Lmclusterid"] == v.LoadMasterClusterID)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Name"] == "Xname")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lmtotalconns")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> last()
